Html:
Under the directions on page 99-100 of pdf, when I tried to create a ShoppingCartIndex by Right clicking in the Shopping Cart Controller under Index method and strongly typing to ShopppingCartViewModel, I fail because ShopppingCartViewModel is not there in the list of Model classes. Though, I had already created a folder “ModelView” under ( Model Folder ) cantaining (1) ShopingCartViewModel and (2) ShoppingCartRemoveViewModel.

Please help!

Thank you in anticipation!
